question: As per Koppenâ€™s classification of climate, which of the following is the suitable description of North-East India including North Bengal?
option1: Tropical wet and dry climate (Monsoon Savannah) (Aw)
option4: Humid sub-tropical climate with dry winter (Cwg)
answer: Humid sub-tropical climate with dry winter (Cwg)
explanation: As per Koppen's classification of climate, North East India including North Bengal has a Humid Subtropical type climate with dry winter.
